name: Path N Liver
title: Pathologic N
notes:
**Note 1:** Histological examination of a regional lymphadenectomy specimen will ordinarily include 3 or more lymph nodes. If the lymph nodes are negative, but the number ordinarily examined is not met, classify as pN0.

**Note 2:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in regional lymph nodes.

**Regional lymph nodes:**

    Hepatic, NOS:
        Hepatic artery
        Hepatic pedicle
        Inferior vena cava
        Porta hepatis (hilar) (in hilus of liver)
    Hepatoduodenal ligament

    Periportal
    Portal vein
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed

Unknown; regional lymph nodes not stated
Not documented in patient record

Regional lymph node(s), NOS
Lymph nodes, NOS

Stated as N1
